example_translation: The weather is hot in summer.

My younger sibling goes to school.

I take a walk in the afternoon.
I have dinner with family in the evening.

example: 저는 아침을 먹었고 친구는 커피만 마셨어요.
example_translation: I ate breakfast and my friend only had coffee.
It rained but we went out.
The road was jammed so I was late.
If you have time let’s go together.
The person drinking coffee over there is my sister.
She is a kind and good-hearted person.
The cake I made yesterday was delicious.

example: 내일 만날 친구는 지금 파리에서 살고 있어요.
example_translation: The friend I’ll meet tomorrow is currently living in Paris.
These are the pants I used to wear often.
The food I ate yesterday was spaghetti.
